text:
The description of the return argument in nilearn.datasets.fetch_icbm152_2009 is hard to read.

Also, we should add a seealso block to point to nilearn.datasets.load_mni152_template and fetch_icbm152_brain_gm_mask
title: nilearn.datasets.fetch_icbm152_2009 docstring isn't great

text:
> The description of the return argument in nilearn.datasets.fetch_icbm152_2009 is hard to read.

I always `print(description)` which gives me clear picture of the description. Do you mean it should be easy to read without `print()` ?
Any reference you can point for example to look at ?
